mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM AS NUM,A.USER_ID AS USER_ID,A.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, A.ROLE_RANK AS ROLE_RANK,A.NICK_NAME AS NICK_NAME,A.SCORE AS SCORE FROM (SELECT (@i:=@i+1) AS NUM,USER_ID,NICK_NAME,SCORE,ROLE_NAME,ROLE_RANK FROM TBL_USER,(SELECT @i:=0) AS IT ORDER BY SCORE DESC) AS A WHERE A.NUM <= 50 OR A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.NUM AS NUM,A.USER_ID AS USER_ID,A.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, A.ROLE_RANK AS ROLE_RANK,A.NICK_NAME AS NICK_NAME,A.MAX_BATTLE_SCORE AS SCORE FROM (SELECT (@i:=@i+1) AS NUM,USER_ID,NICK_NAME,MAX_BATTLE_SCORE,ROLE_NAME,ROLE_RANK FROM TBL_USER,(SELECT @i:=0) AS IT ORDER BY MAX_BATTLE_SCORE DESC) AS A WHERE A.NUM <= 50 OR A.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER ( USER_ID, MOBILE_PHONE, NICK_NAME, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_RANK, PET_NAME, MOUNTS_NAME, MOUNTS_RANK, SCORE, MAX_BATTLE_SCORE, JOIN_ARENA_COUNT, IS_CONTINUE_WIN, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{mobilePhone}, #{nickName}, #{roleName}, #{roleRank}, #{petName}, #{mountsName}, #{mountsRank}, #{score}, #{maxBattleScore}, #{joinArenaCount}, #{isContinueWin}, #{createTime} )
